name: Jobb!
description:
Made by:
Eirik Jarle Henriksen
Marika Sofie Grøsfjeld
Joakim Løland
Andreas Mannes
Christian Grønvold
Marius J Mathisen
Anette Rana

Controls: 
Move mouse to aim, left mouse button to shout at employees.

Description:
You are the boss, so you get to tell people to work ("jobb"). By yelling at employees who are slacking up, you boost their motivation and improve your cashflow. Yelling at people who are working however, will have the opposite effect. 

Made during Valmuen Game Jam November 2019, where the theme was "Shooting gallery"
